item.title: job011
item.description: Job alias: None Preview of random autopicked micrograph: 0 Job command(s): 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Executing new job on Wed May 26 14:54:48 2021 with the following command(s): which relion_autopick --i CtfFind/job003/micrographs_ctf.star --odir AutoPick/job011/ --pickname autopick --topaz_exe /public/EM/RELION/topaz --topaz_nr_particles 300 --particle_diameter 180 --topaz_extract --topaz_model AutoPick/job010/model_epoch10.sav --gpu "1" --pipeline_control AutoPick/job011/
